summary: The diff adds a new LaundryPriceCalculator component and mounts it in App.tsx. Core pricing math and non-negative/invalid input handling appear implemented, but there is evidence the quantity inputs may not actually display a default value of 0 due to rendering 0 as an empty string. Several unrelated UI/theme/docs changes also appear.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each quantity input defaults to 0 (visible as 0) on first load.
missing_requirements.reason: In the new calculator component, the input value is set to `shirtQty || ''` (and similarly for other quantities). Since `0` is falsy, the rendered value becomes an empty string rather than 0, which conflicts with the AC that inputs default to 0.

hallucinated_features.description: Added lucide-react icons and extensive decorative styling (gradients, themed cards) for calculator items.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for the calculator UI elements/logic and English text; it does not request iconography or a redesigned themed layout.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling/theme and Tailwind configuration changes (OKLCH warm amber/orange theme tokens).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asks to modify global CSS or Tailwind theme configuration for this feature.

hallucinated_features.description: README documentation updates describing the application and features.
hallucinated_features.reason: Documentation updates were not requested as part of adding the calculator UI.
